scripts.dist: npm run dist:osx && npm run dist:win32 && npm run dist:win64

releases.body: support new cheer badges

- fix the text-only online indicator
- added some nice styles to the setting options

- new appearance option tab!
  - only appearance option for now: channel bar style
- minor color fixes

- replaced token copypasta link by actual auth dialog
- added settings menu to footer buttons, moved streamer mode into that menu
- added possibility for icons to menus
- we're now handling connection errors properly
minor UI improvements for the emote picker

- new feature: emote picker
- visually improved context menus a bit
- the search field in the "add channel" dialog is now automatically focused when you open the dialog
- fixed not being able to leave the channel that was auto-joined via streamer mode
- fixed app closing completely when pressing reconnect button on non-Mac

- added ability to leave a channel
- do not overwrite channel data if the Twitch API is not working
- fixed a really rare case where a message wouldn't show up

- new settings library used (IMPORTANT: this version resets your settings - hope it's the last time I have to do that)
- cache channel API results to prevent the display name / profile picture flash

- add button to open settings
- fix some bugs regarding reopening window etc.

- added tooltips to emotes
- fixed being stuck in streamer mode
minor style improvements for streamer mode and forms
Support new cheermotes
Windows fixes for streamer mode
Introducing "Streamer Mode" - focus on your own channel while streaming!
Fixed emotes not being shown after reopening window

sorry, no builds here
- major restructuring of code to allow easier extension later
- show loyalty badges
- show cheer messages
- show resub messages

- limit to 1000 lines per channel (non-configurable as of now)
- fix windows closing bug

- online notifications
- fix Twitch Turbo "monkey" emote variations

- add online indicators to channel list and title
- add indicators to channel list when there are unread messages in the channel
- update channel title/game/etc. every 10 minutes (soon to be configurable)
- fix url regex one more time
- fix staff badge color

- show channel info in the top bar
- show channel logo in the channel list
- improve URL matching
- increase default window size
- replace twitch default avatar by a new one

- fix BTTV emotes not being shown when posted by someone else
- fix broadcaster badge for yourself
- do not parse sub emotes twice when posted by yourself

- show BTTV emotes
- link posted URLs
fix showing own emotes with special characters

- show own emotes
- don't show superfluous scrollbars on Windows
- fix some possible memory leaks
fix auto scrolling

- actually show system buttons on windows
- make system buttons (close, maximize, minimize) work better
- display actions (/me) and channel events
- use correct directory for settings

- add sub badges
- properly capitalize channel names in the list
- remove "playing" line if not playing anything
First official build
